text: Vijay Reddy (1936 - 9 October 2020) was an Indian movie director and screenwriter. He was born in Tadepalligudem, Andhra Pradesh. His career began in 1970 and he retired in 2003. He directed Gandhada Gudi, Mayura and Mojugara Sogasugara. His first movie was Rangamahal Rahasya and his last was Hrudayanjali. Vijay died at a hospital in Chennai on 9 October 2020 from cardiac arrest at the age of 84.ಡಾ. ರಾಜ್ ಅಭಿನಯದ ಗಂಧದಗುಡಿ ನಿರ್ದೇಶಕ ವಿಜಯ್ ರೆಡ್ಡಿ ಇನ್ನಿಲ್ಲ ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Indian screenwriters Category:Indian movie directors
title: Vijay (director)
